Query.Sentence: SELECT #COLUMNS# from registros_camiones rc left join delivery_notes dn on rc.id_delivery_note = dn.id_delivery_note left join plates p on rc.id_plate =p.id_plate left join trailer_plates tp on rc.id_trailer_plate =tp.id_trailer_plate #WHERE#

WITH date_range AS (SELECT generate_series( (SELECT MIN(date_in) FROM registros_camiones), (SELECT MAX(date_in) FROM registros_camiones), '1 day' )::DATE AS generated_date ) SELECT date_range.generated_date as day, COALESCE(conteo, 0) as acumulated FROM date_range LEFT JOIN ( SELECT date(date_in) AS fecha, COUNT(*) AS conteo FROM registros_camiones sr GROUP BY date(date_in) ) AS sr_count ON date_range.generated_date = sr_count.fecha ORDER BY date_range.generated_date;
